name: ESPL ARENA
description: ESPL was founded in 2019 and launched its amateur esports tournament platform in 2020. Today it has evolved into a globally integrated eSports tournament platform catering to gaming communities worldwide. Its use-generated tournament (UGT) and host-to-earn solutions is revolutionizing eSports tournaments enabling organizers access to a novel way of engaging and building gaming communities. One that leverages the power of blockchain technology, ushering in the dawn of Web 3.0 gaming.
